Class Tile

java.lang.Object
Tile
public class Tile extends Object
Implements the functionality of a tile

      Parameters:

      true if tile is open on side dir, false otherwise

    • getPlayers

      public String[] getPlayers()
      Returns all players that are on this Tile
      Returns:
      String[] that is populated with the players that are currently on this Tile

    • setPlayers

      Changes this.players to the player argument
      Parameters:
      players - new list of players that are on this Tile

    • toBooleanArray

      public boolean[] toBooleanArray()
      Converts the Tile to an array of booleans
      Returns:
      boolean[] populated with four booleans, indicating to which sides the Tile is open/closed
